question: i will be going on ship soon for sailing. As most of the time on ships food served will not be zabiha. So please advise me if I can consume non-zabiha food in these conditions...
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Non-Zabiha foods are Haraam. It is not permissible to consume such foods. You should request for sea foods or vegetable dishes.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
